page.title: 10Arts and crafts in Langho
page.content: The art and craft work in the area mainly consists of (1) Evening classes run by Lancashire Adult Education , with classes for painting in oils or watercolours , and craft classes in pewter or copper metal work , pottery painting and flower arranging - always popular courses . (2) Classes organised by the W.I. , which are on a very varied scale of craft work run as beginners classes to create interest , so that members can go on to do more advanced work . (3) Craft work in the junior schools is still a very popular subject . Craft exhibitions are occasionly held in Sailsbury village so that craft workers both from the area and outsiders can exhibit and sell their work . There are no craft shops in the area .
